Collection of winter photos that bring a chill to your soul.

We made a home page, about us page, and the statically generated blog/picture pages. The home page and the about us page share the same format with the nav bar and footer crediting the photo website we used. Our about us page has our githubs and our blogs contain a photo followed by a caption and the photographer's information.

Here's all the cool cats that contributed to this and their Github pages
